items.question: I forgot my PIN. What do I do?
items.answer: Tap the 'Forgot PIN?' link on the lock screen. You will be asked to answer the Security Question you set up in the 'Security & Recovery' section.

items.question: Can I turn off specific subjects?
items.answer: Yes! Scroll up to the 'Focus Subjects' section. You can toggle off any subject (like Math or Reading) that you don't want to appear on the lock screen.

items.question: Why doesn't the app lock immediately?
items.answer: The app uses a 'Lock Frequency' timer (e.g., 15 minutes) so it doesn't interrupt your child too often. You can adjust this timer in the settings above.

items.question: A question has a mistake. How do I report it?
items.answer: Please take a screenshot of the question (showing the ID in the bottom corner) and email it to our support team at support@screenlearn.app.
